text: The Death of the Horse () is a 1992 Albanian psychological drama film directed by Saimir Kumbaro and starring Timo Flloko, Rajmonda Bulku, Niko Kanxheri. The film is very noted for being the first anti-communist Albanian film made during dictatorship of Enver Hoxha. ==Cast== * Timo Flloko * Niko Kanxheri * Rajmonda Bulku ==External links== * Category:Albanian films Category:1992 films Category:Albanian-language films Category:Albanian drama films Category:1992 drama films
title: The Death of the Horse
